step_description: Check if the user wants to create AI-generated music using Sonauto
description: Music apps use the Sonauto API to generate AI songs and create music experiences. These include song generators, playlist builders, beat machines, mood radios, remix tools, and interactive music toys. Look for ANY request involving music creation, generation, or interactive music experiences.
good_examples: make me a song that sounds like Taylor Swift
make a mood radio with different vibes
create a song about summer vacation
make a song with lyrics about love
create a jingle for my business
write a song in the style of The Beatles
key_indicators: References beat machines or music layers
Contains 'song' or 'music' with creation verbs (make, create, generate, write, compose)
Mentions specific music genres or artists to emulate
Asks for lyrics to be turned into music
References Sonauto or AI music generation
Requests custom music for specific purposes (birthday, business, mood)
Mentions BPM, tempo, or music parameters
Asks for music toys or interactive sound

decision_logic.if_yes:
MUSIC_DETECTED: Stop here - this needs the Sonauto music generation builder.

The user wants to create AI-generated music. DO NOT attempt to build a generic app. Simply expand their music creation request and output the metadata.

APP_TYPE: music
decision_logic.if_no:
NOT_A_MUSIC_APP: This is not a music generation request.

Continue to next classification step.
